mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.phone AS "phone", a.password AS "password", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.id_card_no AS "idCardNo", a.name AS "name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.sex AS "sex", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.birth AS "birth", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.age AS "age", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.profession AS "profession", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.corp AS "corp", a.scienerUserName AS "scienerUserName", a.scienerPassword AS "scienerPassword"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_app_user( id, phone, password, create_by, id_card_no, name, create_date, sex, update_by, birth, update_date, age, remarks, profession, del_flag, corp ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{createBy.id}, #{idCardNo}, #{name}, #{createDate}, #{sex}, #{updateBy.id}, #{birth}, #{updateDate}, #{age}, #{remarks}, #{profession}, #{delFlag}, #{corp} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_app_user SET phone = #{phone}, password = #{password}, id_card_no = #{idCardNo}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, birth = #{birth}, update_date = #{updateDate}, age = #{age}, remarks = #{remarks}, profession = #{profession}, corp = #{corp}, scienerUserName = #{scienerUserName}, scienerPassword = #{scienerPassword} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.phone AS "phone", a.password AS "password", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.id_card_no AS "idCardNo", a.name AS "name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.sex AS "sex", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.birth AS "birth", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.age AS "age", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.profession AS "profession", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.corp AS "corp", a.scienerUserName AS "scienerUserName", a.scienerPassword AS "scienerPassword", attach.ATTACHMENT_PATH AS "avatar", attach2.ATTACHMENT_PATH AS "idCardPhoto＿front", attach3.ATTACHMENT_PATH AS "idCardPhoto＿back" FROM t_app_user a left join t_attachment attach on a.id=attach.BIZ_ID and attach.attachment_type='APP_USER_AVATAR' and attach.del_flag = 0 left join t_attachment attach2 on a.id=attach2.BIZ_ID and attach2.attachment_type='APP_USER_ID_FRONT' and attach2.del_flag = 0 left join t_attachment attach3 on a.id=attach3.BIZ_ID and attach3.attachment_type='APP_USER_ID_BACK' and attach3.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.phone = #{phone}

select h.service_user from t_rent_contract rc left join (select CONTRACT_ID, te.CELL_PHONE from t_contract_tenant cte, t_tenant te where cte.TENANT_ID = te.id and cte.del_flag='0' and te.del_flag='0') ct on rc.id = ct.contract_id join t_house h on h.ID = rc.HOUSE_ID where ct.cell_phone = #{phone} and rc.data_source = '2' and rc.CONTRACT_BUSI_STATUS = '0' limit 1

select h.service_user from t_rent_contract rc join t_house h on h.ID = rc.HOUSE_ID where rc.id = #{contract_id} union select house.service_user from t_rent_contract rc join t_room h on h.ID = rc.ROOM_ID join t_house house on house.ID = h.HOUSE_ID and rc.ID = #{contract_id}
